title: Block
description: A block in the block diagram protocol which represents a function/computation that maps from a domain to a codomain.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: A unique identifier for the block.

Domain.title: Domain
Domain.description: The domain of the block which are IDs of spaces. Spaces may be repeated or it may be an empty array.

Codomain.title: Codomain
Codomain.description: The codomain of the block which are IDs of spaces. Spaces may be repeated or it may be an empty array.
